history.proof: unfold continuous. intros P HP. sfirstorder depth: 3.

tactic: apply filterlim_comp_2 with (f:=fst) (g:=snd) (h:=fun x => x) (x0:=(x, y)).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable x0 (possible names are: f, g and h).

original: unfold continuous. intros P HP. apply filterlim_comp_2 with (f:=fst) (g:=snd) (h:=fun x => x) (x0:=(x, y)). - apply filterlim_const. - apply filterlim_const. - apply continuous_ext with (f:=id). + intros x. reflexivity. + apply filterlim_opp.
